verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of man ח֥וּד <WH2330> chud put forth חִידָ֖ה <WH2420> chi-Dah a riddle וּמְשֹׁ֣ל <WH4911> u-me-Shol and speak מָשָׁ֑ל <WH4912> ma-Shal; a parable אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> beit unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וְאָמַרְתָּ֞ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הַנֶּ֤שֶׁר <WH5404> han-Ne-sher eagle הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> hag-ga-dOl A great גְּד֤וֹל <WH1419> ge-Dol with great הַכְּנָפַ֙יִם֙ <WH3671> hak-ke-na-Fa-yim wings אֶ֣רֶךְ <WH750> 'E-rech long הָאֵ֔בֶר <WH83> ha-'E-ver, pinions מָלֵא֙ <WH4392> ma-Le full הַנּוֹצָ֔ה <WH5133> han-no-Tzah, of feathers אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after ל֖וֹ <WH99999> lo הָֽרִקְמָ֑ה <WH7553> ha-rik-Mah; which had divers colours בָּ֚א <WH935> ba came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> hal-le-va-Non, unto Lebanon וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צַמֶּ֥רֶת <WH6788> tzam-Me-ret the highest branch הָאָֽרֶז׃ <WH730> ha-'A-rez. of the cedar

אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh the top יְנִֽיקוֹתָ֖יו <WH3242> ye-ni-ko-Tav of his young twigs קָטָ֑ף <WH6998> ka-Taf; He cropped off וַיְבִיאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH935> vay-vi-'E-hu and carried אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz it into a land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an, of traffick בְּעִ֥יר <WH5892> be-'Ir it in a city רֹכְלִ֖ים <WH7402> ro-che-Lim of merchants שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <WH7760> sa-Mo. he set

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach He took מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> miz-Ze-ra' also of the seed הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the land וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <WH5414> vai-yit-te-Ne-hu and planted בִּשְׂדֵה־ <WH7704> bis-deh- field זָ֑רַע <WH2233> Za-ra'; it in a fruitful קָ֚ח <WH3947> kach he placed עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- beside מַ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, [it] by great צַפְצָפָ֖ה <WH6851> tzaf-tza-Fah it [as] a willow tree שָׂמֽוֹ׃ <WH7760> sa-Mo. [and] set

וַיִּצְמַ֡ח <WH6779> vai-yitz-Mach And it grew וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi and became לְגֶ֨פֶן <WH1612> le-Ge-fen vine סֹרַ֜חַת <WH5628> so-Ra-chat and became a spreading שִׁפְלַ֣ת <WH8217> shif-Lat of low קוֹמָ֗ה <WH6967> ko-Mah, stature לִפְנ֤וֹת <WH6437> lif-Not turned דָּלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <WH1808> da-li-yo-Tav whose branches אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, toward וְשָׁרָשָׁ֖יו <WH8328> ve-sha-ra-Shav toward him and the roots תַּחְתָּ֣יו <WH8478> tach-Tav under יִֽהְי֑וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu; remained וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi became לְגֶ֔פֶן <WH1612> le-Ge-fen, thereof were under him so it became a vine וַתַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vat-Ta-'as and brought forth בַּדִּ֔ים <WH905> bad-Dim, branches וַתְּשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> vat-te-shal-Lach and shot פֹּארֽוֹת׃ <WH6288> po-Rot. forth sprigs

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> vay-Hi become נֶֽשֶׁר־ <WH5404> ne-sher- eagle אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad There was also another גָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, great גְּד֥וֹל <WH1419> ge-Dol with great כְּנָפַ֖יִם <WH3671> ke-na-Fa-yim wings וְרַב־ <WH7227> ve-rav- and many נוֹצָ֑ה <WH5133> no-Tzah; feathers וְהִנֵּה֩ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold הַגֶּ֨פֶן <WH1612> hag-Ge-fen and behold this vine הַזֹּ֜את <WH2063> haz-Zot likewise כָּֽפְנָ֧ה <WH3719> ka-fe-Nah did bend שָׁרֳשֶׁ֣יהָ <WH8328> sho-ro-Shei-ha her roots עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, toward וְדָֽלִיּוֹתָיו֙ <WH1808> ve-da-li-yo-Tav her branches שִׁלְחָה־ <WH7971> shil-chah- toward him and shot forth לּ֔וֹ <WH99999> lo, לְהַשְׁק֣וֹת <WH8248> le-hash-Kot toward him that he might water אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> o-Tah, מֵעֲרֻג֖וֹת <WH6170> me-'a-ru-Got it by the furrows מַטָּעָֽהּ׃ <WH4302> mat-ta-'Ah. of her plantation

אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- beside שָׂ֥דֶה <WH7704> Sa-deh soil טּ֛וֹב <WH2896> Tov in a good אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- beside מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> rab-Bim by great הִ֣יא <WH1931> hi it was שְׁתוּלָ֑ה <WH8362> she-tu-Lah; It was planted לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot that it might bring forth עָנָף֙ <WH6057> 'a-Naf branches וְלָשֵׂ֣את <WH5375> ve-la-Set and that it might bear פֶּ֔רִי <WH6529> Pe-ri, fruit לִהְי֖וֹת <WH1961> lih-Yot become לְגֶ֥פֶן <WH1612> le-Ge-fen vine אַדָּֽרֶת׃ <WH155> 'ad-Da-ret. that it might be a goodly ס sa-Mek

אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> 'e-Mor, Say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> 'a-Mar thou Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהֹוִ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD תִּצְלָ֑ח <WH6743> titz-Lach; Shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <WH3808> ha-lO nor אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁרָשֶׁ֨יהָ <WH8328> sha-ra-Shei-ha the roots יְנַתֵּ֜ק <WH5423> ye-nat-Tek ;shall he not pull up וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פִּרְיָ֣הּ׀ <WH6529> pir-Yah the fruit יְקוֹסֵ֣ס <WH7082> ye-ko-Ses thereof and cut off וְיָבֵ֗שׁ <WH3001> ve-ya-Vesh, thereof that it wither כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all manner טַרְפֵּ֤י <WH2964> tar-Pei in all the leaves צִמְחָהּ֙ <WH6780> tzim-Chah of her spring תִּיבָ֔שׁ <WH3001> ti-Vash, ;it shall wither וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor בִזְרֹ֤עַ <WH2220> viz-Ro-a' power גְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> ge-do-Lah even without great וּבְעַם־ <WH5971> u-ve-'am- people רָ֔ב <WH7227> Rav, or many לְמַשְׂא֥וֹת <WH5375> le-mas-'ot to pluck it up אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> o-Tah מִשָּׁרָשֶֽׁיהָ׃ <WH8328> mish-sha-ra-Shei-ha. by the roots

וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh Behold שְׁתוּלָ֖ה <WH8362> she-tu-Lah Yea behold [being] planted הֲתִצְלָ֑ח <WH6743> ha-titz-Lach; shall it prosper הֲלוֹא֩ <WH3808> ha-lO not כְגַ֨עַת <WH5060> che-Ga-'at toucheth בָּ֜הּ bah ר֤וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach wind הַקָּדִים֙ <WH6921> hak-ka-Dim when the east תִּיבַ֣שׁ <WH3001> ti-Vash ;shall it not utterly יָבֹ֔שׁ <WH3001> ya-Vosh, wither עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on עֲרֻגֹ֥ת <WH6170> 'a-ru-Got in the furrows צִמְחָ֖הּ <WH6780> tzim-Chah where it grew תִּיבָֽשׁ׃ <WH3001> ti-Vash. it;it shall wither פ Peh
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Moreover the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

אֱמָר־ <WH559> 'e-mor- Say נָא֙ <WH4994> na now לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> le-Veit house הַמֶּ֔רִי <WH4805> ham-Me-ri, now to the rebellious הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo not יְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> ye-da'-Tem Know מָה־ <WH4100> mah- what אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh; these אֱמֹ֗ר <WH559> 'e-Mor, ye not what these [things mean];tell הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold בָ֨א <WH935> va is come מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- [them] Behold the king בָּבֶ֤ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach and hath taken אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מַלְכָּהּ֙ <WH4428> mal-Kah the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שָׂרֶ֔יהָ <WH8269> sa-Rei-ha, thereof and the princes וַיָּבֵ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve thereof and led אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> o-Tam אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav to בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <WH894> ba-Ve-lah. them with him to Babylon

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And hath taken מִזֶּ֣רַע <WH2233> miz-Ze-ra' seed הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> ham-me-lu-Chah, of the king's וַיִּכְרֹ֥ת <WH3772> vai-yich-Rot and made אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> it-To for בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> be-Rit; a covenant וַיָּבֵ֤א <WH935> vai-ya-Ve with him and hath taken אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בְּאָלָ֔ה <WH423> be-'a-Lah, an oath וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֵילֵ֥י <WH352> 'ei-Lei the mighty הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the land לָקָֽח׃ <WH3947> la-Kach. of him he hath also taken

לִֽהְיוֹת֙ <WH1961> lih-yOt become מַמְלָכָ֣ה <WH4467> mam-la-Chah That the kingdom שְׁפָלָ֔ה <WH8217> she-fa-Lah, might be base לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not הִתְנַשֵּׂ֑א <WH5375> hit-nas-Se; that it might not lift itself up לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> lish-Mor [but] that by keeping אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִית֖וֹ <WH1285> be-ri-To of his covenant לְעָמְדָֽהּ׃ <WH5975> le-'a-me-Dah. it might stand

וַיִּמְרָד־ <WH4775> vai-yim-rod- But he rebelled בּ֗וֹ bo, לִשְׁלֹ֤חַ <WH7971> lish-Lo-ach against him in sending מַלְאָכָיו֙ <WH4397> mal-'a-Chav his ambassadors מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, into Egypt לָֽתֶת־ <WH5414> la-tet- that they might give ל֥וֹ lo סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> su-Sim him horses וְעַם־ <WH5971> ve-'am- people רָ֑ב <WH7227> Rav; and much הֲיִצְלָ֤ח <WH6743> ha-yitz-Lach Shall he prosper הֲיִמָּלֵט֙ <WH4422> ha-yim-ma-Let ;shall he escape הָעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> ha-'o-Seh that doeth אֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh, such וְהֵפֵ֥ר <WH6565> ve-he-Fer such [things];or shall he break בְּרִ֖ית <WH1285> be-Rit the covenant וְנִמְלָֽט׃ <WH4422> ve-nim-Lat. and be delivered

חַי־ <WH2416> chai- [As] I live אָ֗נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I נְאֻם֮ <WH5002> ne-'Um saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> Lo, not בִּמְקוֹם֙ <WH4725> bim-kOm surely in the place הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech [where] the king הַמַּמְלִ֣יךְ <WH4427> ham-mam-Lich [dwelleth] that made him king אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> o-To, אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whose בָּזָה֙ <WH959> ba-Zah he despised אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אָ֣לָת֔וֹ <WH423> a-la-To, whose oath וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher and whose הֵפֵ֖ר <WH6565> he-Fer he brake אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִית֑וֹ <WH1285> be-ri-To; and whose covenant אִתּ֥וֹ <WH854> it-To in בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> ve-toch- [even] with him in the midst בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> ya-Mut. he shall die

וְלֹא֩ <WH3808> ve-Lo not בְחַ֨יִל <WH2428> ve-Cha-yil army גָּד֜וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol with [his] mighty וּבְקָהָ֣ל <WH6951> u-ve-ka-Hal company רָ֗ב <WH7227> Rav, and great יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> ya-'a-Seh make אוֹת֤וֹ <WH853> o-To פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> far-'Oh Neither shall Pharaoh בַּמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> bam-mil-cha-Mah, for him in the war בִּשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> bish-Poch by casting up סֹלְלָ֖ה <WH5550> so-le-Lah mounts וּבִבְנ֣וֹת <WH1129> u-viv-Not and building דָּיֵ֑ק <WH1785> da-Yek; forts לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> le-hach-Rit to cut off נְפָשׁ֥וֹת <WH5315> ne-fa-Shot persons רַבּֽוֹת׃ <WH7227> rab-Bot. many

וּבָזָ֥ה <WH959> u-va-Zah Seeing he despised אָלָ֖ה <WH423> 'a-Lah the oath לְהָפֵ֣ר <WH6565> le-ha-Fer by breaking בְּרִ֑ית <WH1285> be-Rit; the covenant וְהִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan when lo he had given יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'a-Sah and hath done לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo shall not יִמָּלֵֽט׃ <WH4422> yim-ma-Let. all these [things] he shall not escape ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֮ <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD חַי־ <WH2416> chai- [As] I live אָנִי֒ <WH589> 'a-Ni I אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo לֹ֗א <WH3808> Lo, not אָֽלָתִי֙ <WH423> 'a-la-Ti surely mine oath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּזָ֔ה <WH959> ba-Zah, that he hath despised וּבְרִיתִ֖י <WH1285> u-ve-ri-Ti and my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הֵפִ֑יר <WH6331> he-Fir; that he hath broken וּנְתַתִּ֖יו <WH5414> u-ne-tat-Tiv even it will I recompense בְּרֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> be-ro-Sho. upon his own head
